mapper.insert: insert into db_gift (SEQUENCEID, PRODUCTID, WEIGHT, COSTPRICE, SELLPRICE, SAVENUM, OPER1, OPER2, SHOPTYPE, SHOPTYPEID, EBAYITEMID, EBAYSITE, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, CATEGORYID, CATEGORY, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTNAMEEN, PICTUREURL, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{costprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sellprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{savenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoptype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoptypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebayitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebaysite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{productname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{productnameen,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{pictureurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
